PHRASE.LANG: Watch the sequence carefully and repeat it by pressing\n[TRIANGLE], [SQUARE] and [CROSS] to win an ice cold can of Red Bull.
Observez attentivement la séquence qui suit et répétez-la à l'aide des touches \n[TRIANGLE], [SQUARE] et [CROSS] pour remporter une canette glacée de Red Bull.
Sieh dir die Abfolge genau an und wiederhole durch Drücken von\n[TRIANGLE], [SQUARE] und [CROSS], um eine eiskalte Dose Red Bull zu gewinnen.
Osserva attentamente la sequenza e ripetila premendo\n[TRIANGLE], [SQUARE] e [CROSS] per vincere una lattina di Red Bull ghiacciata.
Observa la secuencia con atención y repítela pulsando \n[TRIANGLE], [SQUARE] y [CROSS] para ganar una lata bien fría de Red Bull.
Watch the sequence carefully and repeat it by pressing\n[TRIANGLE], [SQUARE] and [CROSS] to win an ice cold can of Red Bull.
Watch the sequence carefully and repeat it by pressing\n[TRIANGLE], [SQUARE] and [CROSS] to win an ice cold can of Red Bull.
You lost. Better luck next time!
Du hast verloren. Versuch es noch einmal!
Hai perso. La prossima volta andrà meglio!
Has perdido. ¡Más suerte para la próxima vez!

Congratulazioni! Hai vinto una lattina ghiacciata di Red Bull!
¡Enhorabuena! ¡Has ganado una lata bien fría de Red Bull!
